entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
